name: Bean Runner (Adish (Dead Brain Studio))
description:
This is my game made for a #BadaSoch game jam 

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Arrow keys - For Movement..

Right Mouse Click - For Shooting Crates

Left Mouse Click - For Grappling Cones

Ctrl - To Crouch (No Use)
